channel.title: Programming on ETdoFresh
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on ETdoFresh

item.title: Home Wrecker!
item.description:
A Global Game Jam game where a house runs around and eats people and materials to keep structural integrity.

Ever had an exhausting shopping trip to decorate your home with all the shipping and handling, etc? Or looked forever to find someone to rent a room? Well look no further! We got you covered! But with all the difficulties of home maintenance, how long can you protect the comfort of your home? (Left click to punch! Right click to hide!)

item.title: Replace Windows Laptop with iPad Pro 2 ‚Äì Final
item.description: <td> <a href="https://www.etdofresh.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/2018-05-05-12.23.50-e1525543595187.jpg"><img class="wp-image-1085 size-medium alignnone aligncenter" src="https://www.etdofresh.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/2018-05-05-12.23.50-e1525543595187-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" srcset="http://localhost/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/2018-05-05-12.23.50-e1525543595187-225x300.jpg 225w, http://localhost/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/2018-05-05-12.23.50-e1525543595187-768x1024.jpg 768w, http://localhost/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/2018-05-05-12.23.50-e1525543595187-1200x1600.jpg 1200w" sizes="(max-width: 225px) 100vw, 225px" /></a> </td> So after one month trying out the iPad Pro 2, I had to go back to a laptop with a real OS on it. I was dangerous enough with just the iPad Pro 2 and I simply loved the user experience, but was not my best self when using just the iPad.

item.title: Replace Windows Laptop with iPad Pro 2 ‚Äì Part 2
item.description: Today I have an iPad Pro 2, a Logitech Smart Keyboard and a pencil. First impressions here we go! The Installation This was quite easy. I just brought my iPhone close to my iPad, and then it just synced my account and downloaded all my apps from my iPhone to my iPad. Great time saver! Goofing off I didn‚Äôt get the pencil and keyboard until mid-week. So all I found myself doing with my iPad when I first got it is watch videos/shows and play my iPhone games on a really big screen!

item.title: Replacing Windows Laptop with iPad Pro 2 ‚Äì Part 1
item.description: The Current Situation I‚Äôm a computer programmer and a computer science master‚Äôs/PhD student. I‚Äôve decided to try an experiment to replace my existing 13.3‚Ä≥ HP Spectre x360 Windows Laptop (awesome laptop by the way) with the 12.9‚Ä≥ iPad Pro 2 . I plan to write a few blog posts that summarize my experience. As far as Apple products go, I have an iPhone 7 Plus. It‚Äôs my only Apple product, and it has been a good purchase.

item.title: Vector Animation Stream 09 ‚Äì Grouping
Vector Animation Stream 08 ‚Äì Final Refactor Stream for the month!
Vector Animation Stream 07 ‚Äì More Fixing Refactoring
Vector Animation Stream 05 ‚Äì Bone Up
Vector Animation Stream 04 ‚Äì Change Modes
Vector Animation Stream 03 ‚Äì More Groups and Layers
Vector Animation Stream 02 ‚Äì Groups and Layers
Vector Animation Stream 01 ‚Äì I‚Äôm Back!
Vector Animation Concept
item.description: I am currently working on software called Vector Animation (subject to change). The software will allow you to draw (or import), bone, animate, and test animations all in one place. The scope is big, but I am trying to avoid any bells or whistles. Draw Mode Vector art has definitely taken hold of many media outlets, like games, websites, comics, etc. Instead of pixels, everything is drawn with lines, curves, polygons, and basic shapes.

item.title: Twitch Streams start October 02, 2017
item.description: My Twitch stream is going to start October 2, 2017 6:00-7:00pm every Monday and Wednesday. I am going to be working on my Vector Animation program targeted mostly towards mobile platforms. Watch the exciting progress I make as I program live on twitch! Haha, ok, watching someone program can almost be considered crazy‚Ä¶ almost as crazy¬†recording it and streaming to the world wide web. :p Also track my progress on Trello to see what will be discussed next stream:

item.title: Get Song Info from rainwave.cc to your stream via OBS Studio.
item.description: UPDATE 9/27/2017Wow! Rainwave.cc tweeted me back with a much better solution. Hence the post below is for educational purposed. Use the much better (and much more official) link below. üôÇ I love listening to video game remix music at¬†https://ocr.rainwave.cc, and wanted a way I can show on my stream the information about the current song being played. I‚Äôm sure there are probably easier ways to do this, but I made a small windows GUI Executable using C#/WPF that will download Album, Title, and Art from rainwave‚Äôs API, and I wanted to share it with you.

item.title: FFMPEG Your Videos to 8MB in Windows for Discord Use
item.description: Here‚Äôs a little windows batch script for sharing your ‚Äúidea‚Äù or ‚Äúthought‚Äù videos that are perhaps too big for Discord. I use FFMPEG to reencode the video to under the 8MB limit. I‚Äôve packaged this code and ffmpeg.exe together for easy distribution later. Download 2DiscordVideo¬†[15.5MB] Instructions: Drag YOUR.VIDEO onto 2DiscordVideo.cmd. Type in how many seconds your video is. It should then perform a 2 pass encoding of your video that will hopefully be less that 8MB.

item.title: Creating a Managed 3D Physics Engine in C# ‚Äì Part I ‚Äì Introduction
item.description: Before I knew the existence of Jitter Physics (which is what I‚Äôll end up using), I decided to try to make my own Physics Engine following Game Physics Engine Developmnet by Ian Millington, and basically got stuck somewhere when making¬†Contact Resolvers for Rigidbodies. However, I wanted to share my experience making Physics Engine, hopefully as briefly as I can while still making sense. Base Data Types Before we get started in creating the very best physics engine (right?

item.title: Discord Notification of Unity Cloud Build via Webhooks
item.description: EDIT: Looks like Unity Cloud Build now has this built in! Yay! Thanks for those that did donated! Hope it helped you out in the interim! I wanted to write a small blog post about how to show notifications on your Discord channel when a cloud build is ready. Here are the steps: (Optional) Add a channel where build notifications will appear Setup webhook URL¬†in Discord Setup translation webhook Connect webhook URL to Unity Cloud Build Done!

item.title: Open with Unity Windows Context Menu
item.description: I found this on Unity Forums (https://forum.unity3d.com/threads/openwithunity-inf.325221/). Thanks rakkarage! Copy text into OpenWithUnity.inf Right click on it Click Install! ¬†

item.title: Forget MinGW Makefiles‚Ä¶ What‚Äôs up Visual Studio?
item.description: Hours‚Ä¶. literally a handful of hours trying to setup MinGW for my class projects. Yeah, MinGW¬†was kicking my butt‚Ä¶¬†I just threw my hands up, waved the white flag, and gave up. You may have saw¬†in the last post that we did get Freeglut working‚Ä¶ but once it came to glew32, it all came unglued.

item.title: Add Freeglut to MinGW
item.description:
More setup! Joy!

After setting up MinGW from our previous post, now we want to add a package called freeglut to our MinGW directory so we can some graphics to our programs.

  • Download freeglut for MinGW from (http://www.transmissionzero.co.uk/computing/using-glut-with-mingw/)
  • Copy the contents into C:\MinGW (or wherever you installed MinGW)

OK! Done!

item.title: Setting up C++ Makefile Project in Visual Studio
item.description:
For my computer graphics course, I have to submit all my projects using C++, compiled using g++ and a Makefile.

If you don‚Äôt know what a Makefile is, it‚Äôs basically a list of steps/depencies to get to the final product. For example, to end up with DogSimulator.exe, you will need to run g++ on DogSimulator.o and Dog.o (compiled objects). And the prerequisites to DogSimulator.o and Dog.o are¬†DogSimulator.cpp and Dog.cpp respectively.

It‚Äôs not too hard in the terminal, because once you have all your files in the terminal, you just type ‚Äúmake‚Äù and the magic ensues. But I‚Äôm a snob for my Visual Studio IDE, so I am going to set it up there. Haha.

item.title: Fall 2016 Starting Up!
item.description:
Fall 2016 semester is starting up, and now I got to figure out what my priorities are. Here are my current goals and projects that I am working towards reaching/completing.

Cargo Bay 5, Sink Lab Games

This project is dear and close to my heart. It is my first indie game that a group of us worked on together outside of the classroom. I really want to get this released, but everything else has been getting in the way. (Unity C#)

Use of Police Force Simulation, University of New Orleans

A Master‚Äôs Thesis project I am working on. We will use Artificial Intelligence Planner to create an intelligient simulation of an Officer dealing with a situation between mother and adult son who will not move out. (Unity C#)
